cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is my car. His name is Pluto because Pluto is no longer a planet and Saturn is no longer a car company. Willing to negotiate down on price.

Ah, how did this get here? I may need to speak with the Product Manager and get this sorted out. In any case, if you duct tape 2 motorcycles together, you'd have a 4-wheeled vehicle... and then we can discuss the philosophical definitions of a car. Just kidding, kindly customer! I'll talk with the Product Manager.

Yep, just spoke with the Product Manager... well, more or less. I found his resignation letter just left on his desk, along with a brown paper bag filled with what I am absolutely positive is a turd. Haven't opened the bag, my nose suggests it isn't necessary. The only thing left to the imagination is whether it's dog, human, or other.

Sorry, customer, I know it's unprofessional to air out the company's dirty laundry. But I don't understand! I think I've been a pretty fair boss: decent pay, good benefits, generous vacation days, and I don't get suspicious if you call in sick! Just take care of yourself, y'know? Hey, wait a minute, why is this worth twice as much as my Saturn???
What's with this guy's hate on my car?!
